an4.76:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kusinarayam viharati upavattane mallanam salavane antarena yamakasalanam parinibbanasamaye.
an4.76:2.1: “Siya kho pana, bhikkhave, ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va, pucchatha, bhikkhave, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha:
an4.76:2.2: ‘sammukhibhuto no sattha ahosi, nasakkhimha bhagavantam sammukha patipucchitun’”ti.
an4.76:2.3: Evam vutte, te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
an4.76:3.2: “siya kho pana, bhikkhave, ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va, pucchatha, bhikkhave, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha:
an4.76:3.3: ‘sammukhibhuto no sattha ahosi, nasakkhimha bhagavantam sammukha patipucchitun’”ti.
an4.76:3.4: Dutiyampi kho te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
an4.76:4.2: “siya kho pana, bhikkhave, ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va, pucchatha, bhikkhave, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha:
an4.76:4.3: ‘sammukhibhuto no sattha ahosi, nasakkhimha bhagavantam sammukha patipucchitun’”ti.
an4.76:4.4: Tatiyampi kho te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
an4.76:5.2: “siya kho pana, bhikkhave, satthugaravenapi na puccheyyatha, sahayakopi, bhikkhave, sahayakassa arocetu”ti.
an4.76:5.3: Evam vutte, te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
an4.76:5.4: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.76:5.6: Evam pasanno aham, bhante. Natthi imasmim bhikkhusanghe ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va”ti.
an4.76:6.1: “Pasada kho tvam, ananda, vadesi. Nanameva hettha, ananda, tathagatassa: ‘natthi imasmim bhikkhusanghe ekabhikkhussapi kankha va vimati va buddhe va dhamme va sanghe va magge va patipadaya va’.
an4.76:6.2: Imesanhi, ananda, pancannam bhikkhusatanam yo pacchimako bhikkhu so sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
